name: blizzard
flavor_text: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
effect_text_extend:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.

During hail, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect_text_simple: Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.
